cause.description:
Anybody who wants to join and help put an end to child abuse all across America.
As Kappa Deltas we have four national philanthropies, one of which being Prevent Child Abuse America. Anyone else outside of KD should join this cause and put an end to all of it!
1. Prevent Child Abuse in Chattanooga, Tennessee, and all over the country
cause.mission: Put an end to child abuse all across the nation.
cause.name: Prevent Child Abuse America
